replies.body:
It's at this moment, that i should release all kinky jokes you made, but for the moment it's a classified file.

btw what avatar are people talking about?
Do you have FEK?
Nop, what's that? typed it into google and got nothing.

Don't ever type that into google, you'll get gay furry porn. I was so confused at first when everybody was like "yeah man FEK is the greatest!" 

And I'm over here like

http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/wat-the-fuck.jpg

That is because it is stickied into GD... *shivers*

Here is a link so that you don't have to venture too far into that section.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview
Nice quick answer.
So, uh, how you likin' my F.E.K avatar? :3

Of course, i already said that i liked this gif in an other thread

it all make sens now

now i have to get one but how do i do that?
In the post I linked you, post a link to the image or gif you want your avatar to be in the comments and a FEK person will change it for you if they approve it (mine barely got approved :3).

~~I'm really going to look stupid if you're kidding~~

It's Forum Enhancer Kit.  Here's the link to the [main thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK-forum-enhancer-kit-fek-40) where you can install it
F.E.K. avatar
LOL, that meme with your F.E.K avatar. It is very..... seductive?
And mine isnt? :,(
Yours is aggressive. Seems like you are forcing Ashe into unwanted action.
...point taken.

Meanwhile I probably just committed murder.

But that is okay. :P

**LIAR**

YOU GET ME TO DO YOUR KILLING DAMN IT

Oh god... that what did I do to get all that blood on me... O.O

Shaco... what happened... I'm so confused...

https://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M9eb2024a828dac5c44783c4138a8869eH0&pid=15.1

No clue... What's the last memory you have?
Good question.
whats FEK?

This should help.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/cg2zx6Ey-fek-30-preview
Nice avatar change.
I thought it was fitting. :3
It's scary...
